title: Saying Goodbye to CSS Files With <style jsx>
summary: It's time to get rid of excess and be free. I'm starting to use the <style jsx>. Goodbye CSS  files. I don't miss you.

blocks.content: I used to use the CSS file for every js file. I become to using syle jsx and 50% savings on the number of files. This way js files will be more isolated and unaffected by changes in other files. Style jsx rules like CSS but it has a few differences.
Conditional styling is very easy. If I want to change the class name conditionally, I just need to use the ternary operator.
